description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Household Library of Ireland's Poets, with full and choice selections from Irish-American poets, and a complete department of authentic biographical notes. Collected and edited by D. Connolly" Author: CONNOLLY, Daniel. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11602.h.17." Page: 8 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1887 Publisher: The Editor Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000765345 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
